comments:
I'm not sure what I did to get here (sorry). I did build a one-to-many mapping using the details view and then manually edited it. I get this error twice, each time I bring a Java class editor to focus. The problem disappears when I close the JPA Details view and does not seem to reappear when I reopen it.

I will try to repeat what I did and see if I can find more details.
